Class ActivityUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.data.util.ActivityUtil
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class ActivityUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for managing activities

    Deprecated: Use org.apache.streams.pojo.extensions.ExtensionUtil
